titleStmt.title: Whereas the worshipful Company of the Mercers, London, upon a proposal made to them by the Reverend Dr. Assheton, did, by a paper dated the 8th of Febr. 1698. publish and declare in the words following: that is to say
titleStmt.author: Mercers' Company (London, England)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
